name: Joining Forces
description:
Merge and unmerge with allies to solve puzzles, platform and explore what lies beneath an ancient temple.  Are you cleaver enough to escape?

Bugs:

  • There is an occasional bug currently where when you are playing on a web browser, all of the animations are sped up to like 3-4x speed of what they should be. If you encounter this bug, we have included a Windows build for you that should work instead.

Controls:

  • WASD to move.
  • Tab to switch between characters.
  • "F" to merge/unmerge characters (unlocked level 2).
  • Click to use elemental power.

What is Project 2021?

Over the course of this year, I am trying to tell a story between all of my games. While you do not need to play any prior or following games to enjoy this, the lore does build. Can you piece together the story that is being told?

Other Cannon Games This Year:

  1. Out Of Time
  2. Armor Of God
  3. Death Percent
  4. Rouge Royale
  5. A Name Is Earned
  6. Last Man Standing
  7. Joining Forces
  8. More Coming Soon ...

Theme:

  • The theme of this jam was 'Joined Together'. In this game, you can merge and separate with allies to solve puzzles and overcome different obstacles. Merge together to form new elements and work your way toward freedom.

Fun Facts

  • Three of the devs had an average of only 9 hours of sleep total during the 48 hours this jam ran for!

Contents:

  • 10 levels to explore.
  • 7 Powers to wield.
  • 3 characters to play as.
